thread.title: Local News: Comedian Eric Omondi shows Kenyan men how to be romantic
thread.title_full: Local News: Comedian Eric Omondi shows Kenyan men how to be romantic

title: Local News: Comedian Eric Omondi shows Kenyan men how to be romantic
text:
By May Jesaro Monday, Oct 5th 2015 at 11:22 Oct 2, 2015 at 10:47am PDT 
By May Jesaro (@KiptuiMay) 
It is safe to say one of our local comedians, Eric Omondi, in knee deep in love with romantic gestures all over his social media accounts. 
Eric released a video two days ago, singing to his girlfriend Shantel. The comedian was playing Sauti Solâ€™s Isabella as his girlfriend watched him lying on top of the piano with a glass of wine beside her. 
He uploaded not only one but three videos showing his elated girlfriend being wooed by his singing. 
Eric had surprised Shantel when she flew into the country with a dance from the FBI crew at JKIA, welcoming her with flowers and kisses. 
Looks like Eric is showing Kenyan men how to be romantic when it comes to treating your girl special.
